quickServices.title: Birth Certificate
quickServices.description: Apply for a new birth certificate or obtain a duplicate copy. Required for school admission, passport, and government ID applications.
requiredDocuments: Hospital discharge summary or birth proof
Two passport-size photos of the child
tips: Birth must be registered within 21 days for free certificate
Late registration (after 1 year) requires additional affidavit
Keep photocopies and original documents ready
Visit Panchayat office during working hours (10 AM - 5 PM)

quickServices.title: Death Certificate
quickServices.description: Register death and obtain death certificate. Required for property transfer, insurance claims, and pension settlement.
requiredDocuments: Applicant's Aadhar Card and relation proof
tips: Death must be registered within 21 days
Medical certificate is mandatory from hospital/registered doctor
Family member or authorized person can apply
Bring original documents for verification

quickServices.title: Property Tax Form
quickServices.description: Submit property tax declaration and payment form. Annual property tax payment for residential and commercial properties within village jurisdiction.
tips: Pay before March 31st to avoid late fees
10% discount for early payment (before December 31st)
Online payment available through village portal
Keep all previous tax receipts for records

quickServices.title: RTI Application
quickServices.description: File Right to Information (RTI) application to seek information from Gram Panchayat under RTI Act 2005.
requiredDocuments: RTI application fee (₹10 for general info)
tips: Clearly mention what information you need
Response will be provided within 30 days
BPL category applicants are exempt from fees
Keep acknowledgment receipt safely

quickServices.title: Gram Sabha Resolution Copy
quickServices.description: Obtain certified copy of Gram Sabha resolutions and meeting minutes for reference and legal purposes.
tips: Mention specific date and agenda of Gram Sabha
Certified copies take 7-10 days to process
Fee may vary based on number of pages
Original documents will be returned after verification

quickServices.title: Income Certificate
quickServices.description: Apply for income certificate required for scholarships, educational admission fee concessions, and government schemes.
tips: Certificate is valid for 3 years from issue date
Required for scholarship and fee concession applications
Processing time: 15-20 days
All family members' income must be declared

quickServices.title: Caste Certificate
quickServices.description: Apply for caste certificate (SC/ST/OBC) required for reservations, scholarships, and government job applications.
tips: Verification process takes 30-45 days
Parent's caste certificate is mandatory
Original documents required for verification
Valid throughout lifetime unless challenged

quickServices.title: Residence Certificate (Domicile)
quickServices.description: Apply for residence/domicile certificate to prove residential address in the village for various official purposes.
requiredDocuments: Electricity bill or property tax receipt
tips: Minimum 3 years residence proof required
Processing time: 10-15 days
Required for government job applications
Keep multiple address proofs ready
